An interface that extends MessageBase with Component message type and ComponentSource.
ComponentSource
An interface to indicate extending MessageSource with Component message type.

A class for loading MessageSources from the directory.
FallingBackLegacyFormatSource
A record that implements FallingBackMessageSource for LegacyFormatSource.

An interface to get the message from two MessageSources.

An interface to represent a file extension.

A Localization implementation for LegacyFormatSource.

A record of the loaded MessageSource.
Loader<T,R>
Represents the Function that do IO related operations, especially loading.
LocaleParser
A class to parse a string to Locale.

An interface that creates the message from the MessageSource.

An interface to hold the messages.
MessageSource<T>
An interface to get the message.

MiniMessageSource

An interface to create a TagResolverBase from the argument.

A record to holds Component message.
PreparedMessage<M>
An interface to hold the message that is ready for sending to Audiences.

A utility class for reading/writing properties file or format.
RawMessageHolder<T>
An interface indicating that messages are held in another type.
ReplacementBase
An interface to create the StringReplacement from the LegacyFormatSource.
StringMessageMap
An implementation class of MessageMap and StringMessageSource.
StringMessageSource
An interface to indicate extending MessageSource with String message type.
StringReplacement
A record that holds strings for String.replace(CharSequence, CharSequence).
TagResolverBase
An interface to create the TagResolver from the MiniMessageSource.
